# NSHapticFeedbackManager.PerformanceTime.now

**Case**

Instructs the system to provide immediate haptic feedback to the user, rather than waiting for synchronization to occur with something visual occurring on screen.

## Declaration

```swift
case now
```

## Constants

- **NSHapticFeedbackManager.PerformanceTime.default**: Allows the system to choose the most appropriate time for feedback to be provided. Currently, this is the next time the screen is updated.
- **NSHapticFeedbackManager.PerformanceTime.drawCompleted**: Instructs the system to provide haptic feedback to the user the next time the screen is updated.
